message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.SE

Reasoning: The paper discusses the integration of micro-ontologies and multi-word units into controlled natural languages for better interpretation of content words, which falls under the category of computational semantics and natural language processing. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). Additionally, the paper also discusses the use of procedural constructs, which is related to artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also mentions the use of multi-domain texts, which could be related to information retrieval (cs.IR) and software engineering (cs.SE).
